stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {-1:1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {1:1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {5:1.0}

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {0.0:1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {0.1*{'inactive':0,'moderate':0.5,'very active':10}[carcinogenic_activity]*{'low':1,'medium':10,'high':100}[human_exposure]:1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {1*{'inactive':0,'moderate':0.5,'very active':10}[carcinogenic_activity]*{'low':1,'medium':10,'high':100}[human_exposure]:1.0}
lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {1: 1.0} if economic_value == 0 and cancer_cost == 1 else {0: 1.0}
